headline: Charter Communications, Inc. (CHTR)’s Management Is “Dreaming,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Mind As He Discussed A “Weird Number”. Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the biggest broadband and cable services providers in America. The fact that its shares are down by 18% is unsurprising […]

headline: SPECTRUM'S SEAMLESS ENTERTAINMENT NOW EVEN EASIER WITH ENHANCED DIGITAL SELF-SERVICE FEATURES
summary: Spectrum today announced the rollout of new digital self-service features designed to make it even easier and more cost-effective for TV and Internet customers to enjoy the Company's industry-leading Seamless Entertainment experience. TV customers whose plans include free access to streaming services can now upgrade to commercial-free streaming from the My Spectrum App or Spectrum.net by paying only the retail price difference between the "with ads" and "without ads" versions.
